traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the ettercap knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The ettercap makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the ettercapâ€™s next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Web Strand
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12, one Large or smaller creature the ettercap can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Restrained condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

bonus_actions.name: Reel
bonus_actions.description: The ettercap pulls one creature within 30 feet of itself that is Restrained by its Web Strand up to 25 feet straight toward itself.
